scripts.build: npm run generate-manifest && npm run compress-models && vite build
scripts.compress-models: gltf-pipeline -i public/Models/RPGBoy1.glb -o public/Models/RPGBoy1.glb --optimize --compressTextures && gltf-pipeline -i public/Models/RPGGirl.glb -o public/Models/RPGGirl.glb --optimize --compressTextures && gltf-pipeline -i public/Models/enemy0.glb -o public/Models/enemy0.glb --optimize --compressTextures
